# Ads

## Ads Attributes

Ad Service Attributes

| Attribute | Type | Description | Examples | Stability |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| <a id="app-ads-ad-request-type" href="#app-ads-ad-request-type">`app.ads.ad_request_type`</a> | string | Type of ad request (TARGETED or UNKNOWN) | `TARGETED`; `UNKNOWN` | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |
| <a id="app-ads-ad-response-type" href="#app-ads-ad-response-type">`app.ads.ad_response_type`</a> | string | Type of ad response (TARGETED or RANDOM) | `TARGETED`; `RANDOM` | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |
| <a id="app-ads-category" href="#app-ads-category">`app.ads.category`</a> | string | Category of ads being retrieved | `electronics`; `sports` | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |
| <a id="app-ads-context-keys" href="#app-ads-context-keys">`app.ads.contextKeys`</a> | string | List of context keys provided in ad request | `[electronics, sports]` | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |
| <a id="app-ads-context-keys-count" href="#app-ads-context-keys-count">`app.ads.contextKeys.count`</a> | int | Count of context keys in the request | `2` | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |
| <a id="app-ads-count" href="#app-ads-count">`app.ads.count`</a> | int | Number of ads being served | `2` | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |
